column4: how would i go about configuring Ubuntu9 to use a 10.04.2 (LTS) repository for package updates with APT? i.e. I installed an older version of the distribution originally, but I still want the latest userland utilities without re-installing (I've already upgraded the kernel.)
9.10 won't be supported forever, whereas 10.04 is an LTS release and thus will be supported for three years
i understand that.. i just don't want to have to re-install due to downtime since this is Ubuntu server
